name: Coalition of European Lobbies on Eastern African Pastoralism
goal: The voluntary participants of the informal Coalition work together to lobby their national governments, EU bodies (Council, Parliament and Commission) as well as other policy formulating bodies/agencies in Europe (f.e. the European Headquarters of the United Nations in Geneva and the FAO in Rome) to explicitly recognise and support pastoralism (and the people that practise pastoralism: pastoralists) in the dry lands of Eastern Africa.
interests: Development, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid
euInitiatives: European Development policies: EDF, DCI, Joint EU-Africa Strategy, EU-ACP JPA, Agenda for Change, Sustainable Development Goals, Climate Change Agenda, Policy Coherence for Development, EU Consensus for Development
